data.Name: Tha Boogie Bandit
data.Bio: Born and raised in Los Angeles, California, Tha Boogie Bandit currently resides in Tokyo, Japan and has spun the main floors at world-famous venues ageHa, WOMB, Sound Museum Vision, and more. He is one half of CtrlFreaks, a DJ duo with over 100,000 subscribers to their bi-monthly iTunes podcast. In addition to spinning a mixture of electro, progressive, house and dubstep alongside artists such as Laidback Luke, Wolfgang Gartner, Lazy Rich, Lucky Date Read more on Last.fm
